title: Monster (command)
data:
The **#monster** extended command allows [you](/wiki/You "You") to use the special ability of a [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") form you are [polymorphed](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph") into. This may cost some [energy](/wiki/Energy "Energy"). If you do not have any such ability, you will receive the message "Any special ability you may have is purely reflexive." If you are not polymorphed, you will receive the message "You don't have a special ability in your normal form!"

| Monster                                              | Ability                                                                                                | Cost in [power](/wiki/Power "Power") |
| ---------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------ |
| [Black naga](/wiki/Black_naga "Black naga")          | Spit venom                                                                                             | —                                    |
| [Cave spider](/wiki/Cave_spider "Cave spider")       | Spin web                                                                                               | —                                    |
| [Cobra](/wiki/Cobra "Cobra")                         | Spit venom                                                                                             | —                                    |
| [Dragon](/wiki/Dragon "Dragon")                      | [Breath weapon](/wiki/Breath "Breath")                                                                 | 15                                   |
| [Giant spider](/wiki/Giant_spider "Giant spider")    | Spin web                                                                                               | —                                    |
| [Gremlin](/wiki/Gremlin "Gremlin")                   | Split while on a [fountain](/wiki/Fountain "Fountain") or [water](/wiki/Water "Water")                 | —                                    |
| [Guardian naga](/wiki/Guardian_naga "Guardian naga") | Spit venom                                                                                             | —                                    |
| [Hell hound](/wiki/Hell_hound "Hell hound")          | Breath weapon                                                                                          | 15                                   |
| [Iron golem](/wiki/Iron_golem "Iron golem")          | Breath weapon                                                                                          | 15                                   |
| [Lurker above](/wiki/Lurker_above "Lurker above")    | Hide                                                                                                   | —                                    |
| [Mimic](/wiki/Mimic "Mimic")                         | Mimic an item                                                                                          | —                                    |
| [Mind flayer](/wiki/Mind_flayer "Mind flayer")       | Psychic blast                                                                                          | 10                                   |
| [Nymph](/wiki/Nymph "Nymph")                         | Remove [iron balls](/wiki/Iron_ball "Iron ball") caused by [punishment](/wiki/Punishment "Punishment") | —                                    |
| [Piercer](/wiki/Piercer "Piercer")                   | Hide                                                                                                   | —                                    |
| [Pyrolisk](/wiki/Pyrolisk "Pyrolisk")                | Gaze                                                                                                   | 15                                   |
| [Red naga](/wiki/Red_naga "Red naga")                | Breath weapon                                                                                          | 15                                   |
| [Shrieker](/wiki/Shrieker "Shrieker")                | Shriek, [aggravating](/wiki/Aggravate_monster "Aggravate monster") monsters                            | —                                    |
| [Trapper](/wiki/Trapper "Trapper")                   | Hide                                                                                                   | —                                    |
| [Umber hulk](/wiki/Umber_hulk "Umber hulk")          | Gaze                                                                                                   | 15                                   |
| [Unicorn](/wiki/Unicorn "Unicorn")                   | Use [horn](/wiki/Unicorn_horn "Unicorn horn")                                                          | —                                    |
| [Vampire](/wiki/Vampire "Vampire")                   | Change form                                                                                            | —                                    |
| [Werecreature](/wiki/Werecreature "Werecreature")    | Summon other creatures of the same type                                                                | 10                                   |
| [Winter wolf](/wiki/Winter_wolf "Winter wolf")       | Breath weapon                                                                                          | 15                                   |

## SLASH'EM

[SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") introduces a number of new monsters that can use special abilities.

| Monster                                                 | Ability                                                                                                | Cost in [power](/wiki/Power "Power") |
| ------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------ |
| [Acid worm](/wiki/Acid_worm "Acid worm")                | Spit venom                                                                                             | —                                    |
| [Babau](/wiki/Babau "Babau")                            | Gaze                                                                                                   | 20                                   |
| [Barking spider](/wiki/Barking_spider "Barking spider") | Spin web                                                                                               | —                                    |
| [Blinking eye](/wiki/Blinking_eye "Blinking eye")       | Gaze                                                                                                   | 20                                   |
| [Bloodshot eye](/wiki/Bloodshot_eye "Bloodshot eye")    | Gaze                                                                                                   | 20                                   |
| [Brownie](/wiki/Brownie "Brownie")                      | Remove [iron balls](/wiki/Iron_ball "Iron ball") caused by [punishment](/wiki/Punishment "Punishment") | —                                    |
| [Catoblepas](/wiki/Catoblepas "Catoblepas")             | Gaze                                                                                                   | 20                                   |
| [Chasme](/wiki/Chasme "Chasme")                         | Gaze                                                                                                   | 20                                   |
| [Crystal golem](/wiki/Crystal_golem "Crystal golem")    | Breath weapon                                                                                          | 15                                   |
| [Diamond golem](/wiki/Diamond_golem "Diamond golem")    | Breath weapon                                                                                          | 15                                   |
| [Giant shoggoth](/wiki/Giant_shoggoth "Giant shoggoth") | Hide                                                                                                   | —                                    |
| [Glowing eye](/wiki/Glowing_eye "Glowing eye")          | Gaze                                                                                                   | 20                                   |
| [Kamadan](/wiki/Kamadan "Kamadan")                      | Breath weapon                                                                                          | 15                                   |
| [Pixie](/wiki/Pixie "Pixie")                            | Remove [iron balls](/wiki/Iron_ball "Iron ball") caused by [punishment](/wiki/Punishment "Punishment") | —                                    |
| [Phase spider](/wiki/Phase_spider "Phase spider")       | Spin web                                                                                               | —                                    |
| [Quickling](/wiki/Quickling "Quickling")                | Remove [iron balls](/wiki/Iron_ball "Iron ball") caused by [punishment](/wiki/Punishment "Punishment") | —                                    |
| [Recluse spider](/wiki/Recluse_spider "Recluse spider") | Spin web                                                                                               | —                                    |
| [Rhaumbusun](/wiki/Rhaumbusun "Rhaumbusun")             | Gaze                                                                                                   | 20                                   |
| [Ruby golem](/wiki/Ruby_golem "Ruby golem")             | Breath weapon                                                                                          | 15                                   |
| [Sapphire golem](/wiki/Sapphire_golem "Sapphire golem") | Breath weapon                                                                                          | 15                                   |
| [Steel golem](/wiki/Steel_golem "Steel golem")          | Breath weapon                                                                                          | 15                                   |
| [Water hulk](/wiki/Water_hulk "Water hulk")             | Gaze                                                                                                   | 20                                   |

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Monster_\(command\)\&action=edit)*

[![This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.0. Click here for more information.](/images/d/d6/Nh360-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.0. Click here for more information.")

**This page may need to be updated for the [current version](/wiki/Current_version "Current version") of *NetHack*.**

It may contain text specific to [NetHack 3.6.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.6.0 "NetHack 3.6.0"). Information on this page may be out of date.

**Editors:** After reviewing this page and making necessary edits, please change the {{nethack-360}} tag to the current version's tag or {{noversion}} as appropriate.
html:
Monster (command)

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

The #monster extended command allows you to use the special ability of a monster form you are polymorphed into. This may cost some energy. If you do not have any such ability, you will receive the message "Any special ability you may have is purely reflexive." If you are not polymorphed, you will receive the message "You don't have a special ability in your normal form!"

Monster Ability Cost in power
Black naga Spit venom —
Cave spider Spin web —
Cobra Spit venom —
Dragon Breath weapon 15
Giant spider Spin web —
Gremlin Split while on a fountain or water —
Guardian naga Spit venom —
Hell hound Breath weapon 15
Iron golem Breath weapon 15
Lurker above Hide —
Mimic Mimic an item —
Mind flayer Psychic blast 10
Nymph Remove iron balls caused by punishment —
Piercer Hide —
Pyrolisk Gaze 15
Red naga Breath weapon 15
Shrieker Shriek, aggravating monsters —
Trapper Hide —
Umber hulk Gaze 15
Unicorn Use horn —
Vampire Change form —
Werecreature Summon other creatures of the same type 10
Winter wolf Breath weapon 15

SLASH'EM

SLASH'EM introduces a number of new monsters that can use special abilities.

Monster Ability Cost in power
Acid worm Spit venom —
Babau Gaze 20
Barking spider Spin web —
Blinking eye Gaze 20
Bloodshot eye Gaze 20
Brownie Remove iron balls caused by punishment —
Catoblepas Gaze 20
Chasme Gaze 20
Crystal golem Breath weapon 15
Diamond golem Breath weapon 15
Giant shoggoth Hide —
Glowing eye Gaze 20
Kamadan Breath weapon 15
Pixie Remove iron balls caused by punishment —
Phase spider Spin web —
Quickling Remove iron balls caused by punishment —
Recluse spider Spin web —
Rhaumbusun Gaze 20
Ruby golem Breath weapon 15
Sapphire golem Breath weapon 15
Steel golem Breath weapon 15
Water hulk Gaze 20
This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.

This page may need to be updated for the current version of NetHack.

It may contain text specific to NetHack 3.6.0. Information on this page may be out of date.

Editors: After reviewing this page and making necessary edits, please change the {{nethack-360}} tag to the current version's tag or {{noversion}} as appropriate.
